text: Ara ebhabe amara manusaderake tadera hadisa janiye dilama yate tara jane ye, allahara pratisruti satya ebam kiyamate kono sandeha ne'i [1]. Yakhana tara tadera kartabya bisaye nijedera madhye bitarka karachila takhana aneke balala, ‘tadera upara saudha nirmana kara.’ Tadera raba tadera bisaya bhalo janena [2].
